reviews.review: I became like unto a god when taking this product. Time and space became mere illusions which I could warp to my will.
Really made me feel like a plane. Would buy again.
I stopped sleeping while taking this product.
Had a great time while using this product. Really felt like my brain was heavier.
Could not regulate my body temperature any time I used this. I felt like I was freezing!!
What I want to know is why was the box it was shipped in so big?? THINK ABOUT THE EARTH!!!
Is this supposed to make your heart race? Meh, I'm ok with that.
Needs more flames. I was really disappointed that this contained no actual explosions :(

items.name: DopeSnowboard
items.description: think as fast as you shred, brah

reviews.review: MUCH better than the regular snowBoard products out there.
I don't understand, where is the snow board??

items.name: TacoFaceplant
items.description: for when you're running on empty

reviews.review: Just skip this product and go to Taco Bell. They have tacos there.
I fell on the ground and it hurt a lot but I took this and my face stopped hurting, actually, I couldn't feel my face at all. Great!!!

items.name: SurfMind
items.description: Your mind is an ocean. Fill it with sea life.

reviews.review: GET THESE FISH OUT OF MY BRAIN.
